elmu.title: ELMŰ Redesign
elmu.subtitle: UI/UX redesign
elmu.summary: Redesigning one of Hungary’s biggest electricity and gas supplier website with its nearly 2 million user base was an outstanding project.
elmu.description: On one hand the aim of the redesign was to adapt to the global brand appearance of the Innogy family, while on the other hand to create a modern, responsive environment. By melting together every background system into one, a single main site emerged where the online customer service page and other company pages are available. Furthermore, we aim to help users in achieving their goals by optimizing work processes and the structure of the new website.
elmu.task: Research, UX/UI design, Testing, Content management

lufthansa.title: Lufthansa Systems Product design
lufthansa.subtitle: Brand identity & UI/UX redesign
lufthansa.summary: Lufthansa Systems is one of the world’s leading IT services provider in the aviation industry. Lufthansa's Crew Bid Manager software supports the entire crew management process, covering all phases from pairing construction to crew rostering, crew tracking and post-flight activities.
other_descriptions: On one hand the aim of the redesign was to adapt to the global brand appearance of the Innogy family, while on the other hand to create a modern, responsive environment. opinions.opinion: They’re very responsive and go above and beyond to meet our needs. We continue working with them, which is the best sign of our satisfaction.
